title: Chess
creator_credit: Salam Ziusudras, Film and Television Institute (WA) and Australian Film Commission
brief_description: A humorous documentary style film with a dark edge to it about a refugee filmmaker’s transition from the brutality of the detention centre to adjusting and adapting to the Aussie way of life, fashion and culture. Contains disturbing images. Written, directed and produced by Salam Ziusudras
